title: Mini-Ep 57: Gaslighting at Work
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 57: Gaslighting at Work
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate offer advice to a skincare newbie on how to start a regimen, get some insider info from a therapist, hear from a woman being gaslit by a colleague, and discover a new holiday: Email Debt Forgiveness Day.To leave a voicemail for a future...
description:
Doree and Kate offer advice to a skincare newbie on how to start a regimen, get some insider info from a therapist, hear from a woman being gaslit by a colleague, and discover a new holiday: Email Debt Forgiveness Day.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Stitch Fix - Visit stitchfix.com/forever35 and get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box.
  • Fabletics - Sign up to be a VIP today and get 2 leggings for $24 when you visit fabletics.com/forever35.
  • milk + honey - Get 25% off your first order when you visit milkandhoney.com and use promo code FOREVER25.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
